markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wolfjaw Armor](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1856)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=134" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 19 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 355 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Hide Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=7)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

[Barbarians](/Classes.aspx?ID=2), [druids](/Classes.aspx?ID=6) and other outlanders are often forced to spend the harsh winter months protecting their communities from one of the deadliest predators to stalk the forests and taiga of the northern reaches, the fearsome winter wolf. This _+1 [hide armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=7)_ is assembled from the hide and fur of a trio of [winter wolves](/Monsters.aspx?ID=403), and it conveys on the wearer both an attack akin to the winter wolves' deadly jaws and the ability to channel the frigid cold of the winter wolf's Breath Weapon.

<document level="2" id="action-1553" />

<document level="2" id="action-1554" />

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include the hides of at least three winter wolves

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Wolfjaw Armor
